root.title: 7 minutes Workout
root.text: 12 high intensity bodyweight exercises. 30 seconds per exercise, 10 seconds rest between exercise.

exercise.name: Push Ups
exercise.description: Push up is an exercise performed in a prone position by raising and lowering the body with the straightening and bending of the arms while keeping the back straight and supporting the body on the hands and toes.

exercise.name: Pull Ups
exercise.description: The pull up is perhaps the best exercise you can do if you want to build a strong, lean upper body. All you need is a bar that will support your weight.

exercise.name: Squats
exercise.description: The squat is the king of lower body exercises. A properly executed squat is not only safe (opposed to what some people claim) but also involves all lower body muscles in addition to upper body ones as well. In order to have well developed legs, the Squat is a must!

exercise.name: Crunches
exercise.description: The crunch is one of the most common abdominal exercises. It primarily works the rectus abdominis muscle.

exercise.name: Triceps
exercise.description: The triceps extension is one of the best bodybuilding exercises for isolating the triceps muscles.
